𒈱𒋞

𓈐 road 𓍯𓏏𓈐 ὁδός hodós (corruption when?) रोड roḍ (new)
𓈐 road 𓍯𓏏𓈐 rho𓍯+D𓏏 roaδ 𒆜 RAŠ রাস্তা raśta raster aɣaras 𒆜 KASKAL Kush
𓈐 road 𓍯𓏏𓈐 aƀriđ a bridge a path :
𓈐 road 𓍯𓏏𓈐 رَافِد rāfid 𒀴 #ardi "tributaries" wadi® 3-paths rapids > raft 𒁀
𓊅 baut būdu path 𓈐 𒋞
𓉐 port ⋍ part ⋍ path not well attested in Egyptian, at least not directly

𒈱𒋞 mall

old complete form:
maroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
𓈘 𓏤 𓊢 𓂝 𓏏 𓉐| mastaba / murod staette

track the.rêge vs ma.rêge reach regel 𓂾:

MURGU 𒈱𒋞 ⇔ मार्ग mārga (road) march 道 みち michi ⇔ Meer?
MA.EGIR 𒈱 길 gil ڕێگە rêge орук oruk < سڑک saṛak street
𓈘 = maroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻 ⇔ 𓈘𓊢𓏏𓉐=𓅓𓊢𓏏𓉐 mastaba

road רְחוֹב rekhóv
road ῥύμη rhúmē < drome 𓏏𓍯 RTL < tra.m train ⇔ track

old complete form:
road, way 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
marodan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
cardan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
broadon 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻 ⇔ platon
maroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
fahroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻 ⇔ vor in 𓎛 𓁷 𓂋 𓈐 հեռավոր heṙavor

The correct vairant above is 𓌻 𓂋 𓂋 𓏏 𓉕 𓉐 street maroad > malu 马路 morou 陌禸街.
The reverse reading thereof is drome
